ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select `main`.`external_id` AS `外販ID`,`main`.`file_class_id` AS `ファイル分類ID`,`main`.`file_attribute_id` AS `ファイル属性ID`,concat(`main`.`file_attibute_name`,'…(',count(`sub`.`attachment_id`),')') AS `ファイル属性名` from ((select `a`.`external_id` AS `external_id`,`b`.`file_class_id` AS `file_class_id`,`b`.`file_attribute_id` AS `file_attribute_id`,`b`.`file_attibute_name` AS `file_attibute_name` from (`t_object_external` `a` join (select `a`.`file_class_id` AS `file_class_id`,`a`.`file_attribute_id` AS `file_attribute_id`,`a`.`file_attibute_name` AS `file_attibute_name` from (`m_file_attirbute` `a` join `m_file_class` `b` on((`a`.`file_class_id` = `b`.`file_class_id`))) where (`b`.`external_flg` = 1)) `b`)) `main` left join (select `t_object_attachment`.`attachment_id` AS `attachment_id`,`t_object_attachment`.`file_attribute_id` AS `file_attribute_id`,`t_object_attachment`.`external_id` AS `external_id` from `t_object_attachment` where ((`t_object_attachment`.`external_id` is not null) and (`t_object_attachment`.`active_flg` = 1))) `sub` on(((`main`.`external_id` = `sub`.`external_id`) and (`main`.`file_attribute_id` = `sub`.`file_attribute_id`)))) group by `main`.`external_id`,`main`.`file_class_id`,`main`.`file_attribute_id`,`main`.`file_attibute_name`
